english: Winterborne pursued his own course homeward .
chinese: 维恩特波恩踏上了回家的路。

english: Scott and his companions set out on the return journey .
chinese: 斯科特和他的伙伴们起身踏上归程。

english: Pete, 18, filled with his dreams, caught a train .
chinese: 十八岁的彼特带着满怀的梦想，踏上了火车。

english: He thought, striking off into trackless wilderness .
chinese: 他一面暗自思忖，一面踏上了无路的荒野。

english: Setting foot on the island, he began to ascend the trail .
chinese: 他踏上荒岛，开始顺着小径往上攀登。
踏上造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: She had hardly started her life and didn't want to die .
chinese: 她刚开始踏上生活的旅途，实在不想死啊。

english: He was on his way, and he was going to be bigger than any of them .
chinese: 他已经踏上了正轨，他一定要超过他们。

english: If i had my way i'd never set foot in the damned country again .
chinese: 要是由着我的话，我永远不会再踏上那个混账国家的土地。

english: Bitterly disappointed, scott and his companions set out on the return journey .
chinese: 斯科特和他的伙伴们十分失望，便起身踏上归程。

english: Colonel brandon immediately afterwards took his solitary way to dalaford .
chinese: 此后，布兰顿上校立刻踏上了前往迪拉弗德的孤寂的旅程。

english: They said good night to john and walked up the king's highway toward the house .
chinese: 他们向约翰尼道了晚安，踏上金氏大道，走向住所。

english: We reached morocco around 10∶00 that evening, for my first step on arab soil .
chinese: 我们大概在当天晚上十时左右到达摩洛哥，这是我第一次踏上阿拉伯国土。

english: Jem skipped two steps, put his foot on the porch, heaved himself to it, and teetered a long moment .
chinese: 杰姆连跨两级踏上走廊，身子跟了上去，然后踉跄好一阵才站稳。

english: Thousands of lanterns slowly drift out to sea guiding the dead on their return journey to the other world .
chinese: 成千上万只灯笼缓缓地向海上漂去，指引着死去的亲人踏上返回另一世界的路途。

english: When they rose up from the ground, and took the shady track which led them through the wood, she bounded on before .
chinese: 当他们站立起来踏上林荫小路穿出树林子的时候，她一蹦一跳地走在前面。
